verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:11
verses.text: And Solomon brought up the daughter of Pharaoh out of the city of David unto the house that he had built for her: for he said, My wife shall not dwell in the house of David king of Israel, because the places are holy, whereunto the ark of the Lord hath come.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:12
verses.text: Then Solomon offered burnt offerings unto the Lord on the altar of the Lord, which he had built before the porch,
